Specimen Type: Clinical specimens from sterile body sites, abscesses, deep wound or surgical samples
Purpose: To accurately identify anaerobic bacteria from clinical specimens using microbiological and biochemical techniques.
Equipment: Anaerobic chamber or jar with gas generator packs, incubator (35–37 °C), Blood Agar and selective anaerobic media, biochemical test systems (RapID ANA II, API 20A, Vitek ANC), microscope
